About

We at Load-it Industries began manufacturing our own recreational loading systems in the spring of 2005. Since that time, we’ve made it our goal to improve our products to meet the ever-growing needs of our customers. Glen Grunert, owner and operator of Load-it Industries has a strong background in precision sheet metal fabrication, design and management, as well as a degree in electronics; all of which he has been able to utilize in manufacturing the most versatile and user friendly loading systems available in today’s market.

We believe in the value of our customers and continuously work to offer you the highest quality products, utilizing the latest technology, at a customer friendly price. We currently have several Loading Systems on our shelf as well as a multitude of accessories that make life just that much easier for you to enjoy the things you like, the way you’d like. For more information on our products and how we can be of service, visit our products page. We look forward to serving you. Glen
